timelineItems.text: Dammit. If #POR ain't going through I want #GHA to.. But at the same time happy to see Ronaldo score. Such confusing times these. :(

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Rubén Amorim (Portugal).
Mubarak Wakaso (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.text: i dont see U.S. fans complaining about Ronaldo now �� #POR

timelineItems.name: Arnaud Gelb
timelineItems.text: Cristiano Ronaldo est le premier joueur du Portugal à marquer dans trois Coupes du Monde différentes. #POR

timelineItems.name: Matt Ward
timelineItems.text: Probably more than half of the country was watching #por game hoping for a goal. valiant effort from #usa but they look exhausted.

timelineItems.name: peach
timelineItems.text: Thanks #POR but still not happy..#USA needs to learn how to attack..they've been playing defense throughout the whole game..

timelineItems.name: Liz
timelineItems.text: Obviously the witch doctor's juju on Ronaldo wasn't strong enough, plus no sign of mr white powder and dreads in the crowd today #GHA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jonathan Mensah following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Manoel Guedes
timelineItems.text: Vai começar mais um jogo da #copa2014 no Mané Garrincha! #brasilia #PORvsGAN #gan #por

timelineItems.name: Mrs. Darkness

timelineItems.name: Syed
timelineItems.text: Its all over for #POR 3 goals within 4 mins is highly unlikely.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Portugal. Conceded by Harrison Afful.

timelineItems.name: fahad ali
timelineItems.text: Portugal 2014 are the fifth World Cup team to field their three goalkeepers in one World Cup and the first in 20 years (Greece 1994) #POR.

timelineItems.name: Emad Dlala
timelineItems.text: I can't believe the most entertaining team in the group is in the bottom of the table. #GHA #BadMentality

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Cristiano Ronaldo (Portugal) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Silvestre Varela.

Asamoah Gyan (Ghana) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
